main.name: Mayur S Chittaragi
main.description: I enjoy building web apps and solving problems. I am always looking for new challenges to learn and grow.
main.bio: Hi there! I am Mayur! I've been coding for over 10 years now. As a budding Full Stack developer I've worked both with clones and other small scale applications. Along the journey I realised that I enjoyed development more than the DS questions or contests. With this passion, I am now on a journey to become a full stack developer. I really enjoy building applications which will be used by people for making their work easier. I hope to become successful in this world of web development by making some applications which can leave it's mark upon the world. I am currently looking for opportunities and projects in order to apply my knowledge and improve the same with each of these challenges.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me if interested in working together!

address.street: B-316, Cauvery Hostel, R V College of Engieering,

work.title: Student
work.description: Trying to complete multiple projects and learn new technologies in the process.
